question.text: Jay fell ill after having sandwich which was kept in the refrigerator. But bacteria/viruses do not survive in cold temperatures, so which response must have the micro-organism adapted to in order to survive

solution.text: There are four major ways through which an organism can cope with stressful conditions: By regulating the constant body temperature, by changing their body temperature with not maintain constant body temperature by getting conformed, migration to the comfortable area and return when the stressful period gets over and suspension of their activities that help to survive in stressful condition (eg. bacteria, fungi and lower plants form thick-walled spores).
